sentences.en: I wish you knew me before I was an insomniac because I used to be a really nice person.
sentences.cn: 我希望在我成为失眠症者之前你就认识我，因为我曾经是个地地道道的好人。

sentences.en: If both of you are insomniac, sitting by yourselves in a lounge, that is the hour when secret concerns and hopes are shared, out of the staff's earshot.
sentences.cn: 如果你们两人都是失眠患者，你们独自坐在大厅里，那就是你们分享秘密的焦虑和希望的时刻，远离工作人员的耳目。

sentences.en: She's an insomniac; she only sleeps for two or three hours a night.
sentences.cn: 她患失眠症, 每晚只睡两三个小时.

sentences.en: The insomniac is habitually afflicted with wakefulness at times when he wishes to sleep.
sentences.cn: 失眠症患者,这种病人在他想睡觉时经常特别清醒.
